preqs: BTB1010 or BTP1010 or BTC1110 or BTG1200 or BTW1200

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {BTB1010, BTC1110, BTG1200, BTP1010, BTW1200} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}

description: Students will examine the role of law and regulation in the context of sport and policy. Topics include the regulation of labour, unions and collective bargaining, performance enhancing drugs and negligence in sport.
